item.description: Avian: The First Actor-Oriented Programming Language Hello and welcome to Avian, the first programming language created for the Actor-Oriented Programming (AOP) paradigm. Avian was made with the pillars of AOP in mind: Explicitness over implicitness Employment Inheritence Polymorphism The rest of this page will be done in the near future. Please be patient during this time :)
